Text.Page:
This time you face the giants and their pets. We cannot tolerate their interference.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:34#1000#icecleaver} and {@LinkCreature:34#1010#icereaver giants}, as well as {@LinkCreature:34#1100#icewalker} and {@LinkCreature:34#1110#frosthunter barsicores}.

Let Kahuere know when you're finished.
Giants slaughtered, check! I'll note this down in your permanent record. Well done, soldier!
My apologies, but your orders seemed clear to me. You must kill the giants and barsicores to get credit for your deeds.
